aboutMe.firstParagraph: I am a software engineer, professionally involved in the field since 2020. My expertise lies in languages such as Java (leveraging the Spring framework) and JavaScript/TypeScript (employing the React framework). I am committed to the meticulous craft of clean code and the rigorous application of best programming practices.
aboutMe.secondParagraph: Throughout my career, I have cultivated a profound appreciation for the art of programming and remain dedicated to advancing my skills in delivering robust and elegant software solutions.

webApplicationDeveloper.description: I develop web applications, integrating frontend and backend. I design user interfaces and implement business logic, ensuring interactivity and responsiveness.

qualityDrivenDeveloper.description: I write clear, understandable, and elegant code, following the best programming practices. I focus on modularity and readability.

cleanCodePractitioner.description: I write clear, understandable, and elegant code, following the best programming practices. I focus on modularity and readability, applying practices such as SOLID, KISS, DRY, YAGNI, etc.

refactoringNinja.description: I specialize in improving existing code, removing unnecessary elements, and optimizing its structure, ensuring readability and performance.

architectureEnthusiast.description: I'm passionate about the architecture of information systems. I strive to delve into the secrets of software design and create scalable, efficient, and flexible systems.

softwareengineer.resp1: Designing, developing, and maintaining the TalentLink application supporting the recruitment process.
softwareengineer.resp2: Full responsibility for both the frontend and backend parts of the application.
softwareengineer.resp3: Collaborating with the team to improve the 'candidate facing' system area and rewriting part of the system related to career pages.
softwareengineer.resp4: Utilizing CI/CD tools to ensure continuity, quality, and efficiency in the development process.
softwareengineer.resp5: Actively participating in UI design and collaborating with the product team and UX team.

juniorsoftwareengineer.resp1: Actively participating in designing and developing the TalentLink application, supporting the recruitment process.
juniorsoftwareengineer.resp2: Responsibility for both the frontend and backend parts of the application.
juniorsoftwareengineer.resp3: Collaborating with the team to improve the 'candidate facing' system area and rewriting part of the system related to career pages.
juniorsoftwareengineer.resp4: Experience in ensuring website compliance with WCAG standards, ensuring accessibility and usability for users with various needs.
juniorsoftwareengineer.resp5: Active participation in team meetings regarding project planning and application development strategies.

internsoftwaredeveloper.resp1: Applying skills acquired during studies to practical software development.
internsoftwaredeveloper.resp2: Active usage of Java and React for application development, and utilizing Git version control system.
internsoftwaredeveloper.resp3: Understanding synchronous communication in REST architecture and writing unit tests.
internsoftwaredeveloper.resp4: Participating in teamwork following Agile methodology and using Atlassian software for project management.
internsoftwaredeveloper.resp5: Developing analytical skills and problem-solving abilities through practical projects.

itspecialist.resp1: Managed both Linux and Windows environments.
itspecialist.resp2: Oversaw the call center software, including the Hermes system, and its MSSQL database.
itspecialist.resp4: Created and administered domains using tools like Samba and QNAP NAS server.
itspecialist.resp5: Developed scripts tailored to client needs, particularly focusing on call center solutions.
itspecialist.resp6: Supervised access security to resources and managed user groups.
itspecialist.resp7: Implemented and maintained the ESET antivirus system.
itspecialist.resp8: Managed and monitored the Fortigate network firewall.
itspecialist.resp9: Utilized programming languages such as PHP and Bash to automate repetitive tasks.
itspecialist.resp10: Developed tools to streamline daily work processes for clients.
